form.label: Physical ports
form.description: Filter using any field [ switchname=All Switches/select one from dropdown ]

fieldset.input:
filter: *-->All Switches switchname switchname
source="arista_switch_inventory" | stats count by switchname | sort switchname 0

search.query: sourcetype="arista_switch_inventory" AristaSwitchCapacity switchname=$filterPorts$ | stats earliest(ports_used) as ports_used_earliest, latest(ports_used) as ports_used_latest, earliest(ports_unused) as ports_unused_earliest, latest(ports_unused) as ports_unused_latest by switchname | table switchname, ports_used_earliest, ports_used_latest, ports_unused_earliest, ports_unused_latest
